flawed_nl_solution:
He cuts off 9-6=<<9-6=6>>6 inches when he gets a haircut
That means he needs to cut it every 6/1.5=<<6/1.5=4>>4 months
So he gets 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 haircuts a year
He gives a 45*0.2=$<<45*0.2=9>>9 tip
So that means each hair cut cost 45+9=$<<45+9=54>>54
So he pays 54*3=$<<54*3=162>>162 a year
#### 162

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
